chapter.title: Introduction to &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.EXAMPLE; Example
chapter.para: &THIS.EXAMPLE; example is a complex example. It is designed to link multiple standards and J2EE technologies into working system. It demonstrates how to use together following:

listitem.para: Enterprise JavaBeans is a managed, server-side component architecture for modular construction of enterprise applications.
Web application framework developed by JBoss. It combines EJB and JSF.
Workflow execution engine which executes bussines processes described in BPEL or jPDL.
Java programming language framework that allows developers to manage relational data in applications using JSE and JEE.
Example is capable of making VOIP calls which can be converted by certain providers into regular phone calls(PSTN).

chapter.para: &THIS.EXAMPLE; is an example of online shop which is capable of VOIP calls to inform user or administrator on accounts activity. Called users can affect shop decisions(accept,deny, set shipping date).
